Text: ThanksThanks for having us up to Beaver Creek this weekend We had a wonderful time I told Raul that Colorado needs to be our vacation every summer bc this was our best one by far Anyway it was a fun spending time with you guys and your parents in such a relaxing place We need to get together soon and share pictures Also I dont know if I can go that long without laughing with and at you Tell Megan thanks too Amy
